name: Whack A Zombie Hitman - Thwack With Your Smashing Hammer!
name_original: Whack A Zombie Hitman - Thwack With Your Smashing Hammer!
description:
Are you quick? Let’s test your skill in this game!

The zombies are coming out from the holes to infect everyone! You need to hit those zombies to save your town!

But watch out.. Not all zombies are the same! They are getting tricky - they have EXPLODING ZOMBIES! Don’t hit them or else, its GAME OVER!!

Meet the four types of zombies in this game and have a chance to meet the King Zombie! HIT HIM QUICK to get higher POINTS! This Zombie King has a higher value on its brain!!

This fun hitting and smashing game features:

»»» AMAZING AND FUN APP WHICH IS GREAT FOR ALL AGES!
»»» Cool graphics! Meet the four type of zombies!!
»»» iOS8 ready!
»»» SPOOKY MUSIC!
»»» 100% PURE FUN FUN FUN!!!!

Download this app now to start hitting those bad zombies!

Note there are no in app purchases in this app but it is advert supported :)

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
